ALL IN US! HI WE ARE ITZY!

ABOUT


ITZY is a south Korean girl group formed by JYP entertainment.

They debuted on 12 February 2019 with the release of their single album, It’z different, led by the single ‘Dalla Dalla’.

Name of fanclub: Midzy
